item.title: 7 Surprisingly Cozy Tiny House Bed Ideas That Will Make You Want to Move In!
item.description: Introduction Tiny houses are becoming increasingly popular among those who want to simplify their lives and downsize their living space But with such a small space, it can be hard to find the right bed to fit Luckily, there are plenty of cozy tiny house bed ideas that will make you feel right at home! Definition of Tiny House A tiny house is a small dwelling, typically ranging from 100 to 400 square feet.
